item.title: Theiving skill-pickpocketing
item.dc:creator: @mrx229 mrx229
item.description:
@mrx229 wrote:

hey every1 im triing to make theiving work on my server…i got this sort of thing in my client but when i try thiev them it doesnt work any know how i can i can get it to work?
{
sendMessage(“You pickpocket the rogue.”);
addItem(995, 500);
addSkillXP(500, 17);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
public void robmasterfarmer()
{
sendMessage(“You pickpocket the master farmer.”);
addItem(995, 800);
addSkillXP(800, 17);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

public void robguard()
{
    sendMessage("You pickpocket the gaurd.");
    addItem(995, 1000);
    addSkillXP(1000, 17);
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
public void robknight()
{
    sendMessage("You pickpocket the knight.");
    addItem(995, 1300);
    addSkillXP(1300, 17);
	updateRequired = true;
	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

help me plz
